features.title: Everything You Need
features.description: A complete toolkit for building production-ready applications with modern best practices.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Optimized for performance with Next.js 16, React Server Components, and edge-ready deployments.

ui.title: Beautiful UI
ui.description: Pre-built components with shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS, and smooth Framer Motion animations.

database.title: Database Ready
database.description: Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL support. Type-safe database queries out of the box.

deploy.title: Multi-Platform Deploy
deploy.description: Deploy to Vercel, Cloudflare, Netlify, Railway, Fly.io, Deno Deploy, or Heroku.

docker.title: Docker Support
docker.description: Production-ready Dockerfile and docker-compose for containerized deployments.

typeSafe.title: Type Safe
typeSafe.description: Full TypeScript support with strict type checking and Zod validation.

modular.title: Modular Architecture
modular.description: Clean project structure with separation of concerns and reusable components.

cicd.title: CI/CD Ready
cicd.description: GitHub Actions workflows for testing, linting, and automated deployments.

dx.title: DX First
dx.description: Great developer experience with hot reload, ESLint, Prettier, and VS Code settings.

techStack.title: Modern Tech Stack
techStack.description: Built with the latest and most reliable technologies in the ecosystem.
techStack.codeComment: // Example: Type-safe database query with Prisma
techStack.liveDemosDescription: See this template in action on different platforms

deploy.title: Deploy Anywhere
deploy.description: Choose your preferred platform. This template is optimized for all major hosting providers.

platforms.flyio: Run apps close to users globally
platforms.render: Unified cloud for apps and sites

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
items: Run npm run dev to start development

database.title: Database Setup
items: Use npx prisma studio for GUI

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Welcome to the community pre-application system! This guide will walk you through the entire process from registration to joining the community.
steps: Register an account on this platform
Fill out and submit your pre-application
Wait for admin review (typically 1-3 business days)
Receive your invite code upon approval
Use the invite code to register on the community

register.title: Step 1: Register Account
register.description: Create your account to start the application process
items: Click the "Register" button in the top navigation bar
Enter your email address (must use an allowed domain)
Create a secure password (8+ characters with uppercase, lowercase, and numbers)
Agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

tips.title: Tips
items: Use a personal email address you check regularly
Check the allowed email domains list before registering

apply.title: Step 2: Submit Pre-Application
apply.description: Fill out the application form with your information
items: Log in and go to Dashboard ‚Üí Pre-Application
Write your application essay (about 100 words recommended)
Enter your registration email (the email you'll use for the community)
Select where you heard about the community (optional)
Set a query token for checking status (optional)

essayTips.title: Essay Writing Tips
items: Be genuine and sincere in your writing
Explain why you want to join the community
Describe what you hope to contribute or learn
Keep it concise but meaningful (around 100 words)

query.title: Step 3: Check Application Status
items: Method 1: Log in and check Dashboard ‚Üí Pre-Application
Method 2: Use your query token on the Query page
Method 3: Check your email for notifications
Method 4: Check Dashboard ‚Üí Messages for updates

statuses.title: Application Statuses
statuses.pending: Pending - Your application is waiting for review
statuses.approved: Approved - Congratulations! Check for your invite code
statuses.rejected: Rejected - Review the feedback and consider resubmitting

inviteCode.title: Step 4: Get & Use Invite Code
inviteCode.description: Receive and use your invite code to join the community
items: Once approved, your invite code will appear in your dashboard
You'll also receive it via email and site message
Paste the invite code in the registration form

warnings.title: Important Notes
items: Invite codes expire after 12 hours - use them promptly!
Each invite code can only be used once
If your code expires, you may need to contact admin
Do not share your invite code with others

resubmit.title: Resubmitting Applications
resubmit.description: What to do if your application is rejected
items: Revise your application based on the guidance

limits.title: Resubmission Limits
limits.content: You can resubmit up to 3 times after rejection. Make each revision count by addressing all feedback points.

items.q: How long does the review process take?
items.a: Typically 1-3 business days, depending on application volume.

items.q: Can I change my application after submission?
items.a: You can only edit your application if it's been rejected or marked for revision.
Check the allowed domains list on the registration and pre-application pages.

items.q: My invite code expired. What should I do?
items.a: Contact admin through the community or resubmit your application.

items.q: Can I apply for multiple accounts?
items.a: No, each person should only have one account. Multiple applications may result in all being rejected.

preApplicationGuide.description: Follow these steps to submit and track your pre-application.
steps: Fill out and submit the pre-application form
Check results via messages and review history
rules: You can edit and resubmit if your latest application is rejected
Once approved, you cannot edit; results are sent via message and email

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your data

sections.intro: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or communicate with us.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUse.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to develop new services, and to protect our company and our users.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized or unlawful processing and against accidental loss, destruction, or damage.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. You can do this through your account settings or by contacting us.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms and conditions for using our services

sections.intro: By accessing and using this service, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

useOfService.title: Use of Service
useOfService.content: You must follow any policies made available to you within the service. Don't misuse our services. You may use our services only as permitted by law.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for safeguarding the password and for all activities that occur under your account.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall the company be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

license.title: License

sections.intro: This section provides comprehensive API documentation for integrating with our services.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.content: All API requests require authentication using Bearer tokens. Include your API key in the Authorization header.

rateLimit.title: Rate Limiting
rateLimit.content: API requests are limited to 100 requests per minute per API key. Rate limit information is included in response headers.

errors.title: Error Handling
errors.content: The API uses conventional HTTP response codes to indicate success or failure. Codes in the 2xx range indicate success, 4xx indicate client errors, and 5xx indicate server errors.

sections.intro: Learn by example with these practical code snippets and use cases.

basicSetup.title: Basic Setup
basicSetup.content: Get started quickly with this basic configuration example.

authentication.title: Authentication Example
authentication.content: Example of implementing user authentication with our services.

database.title: Database Operations
database.content: Common database operations using Prisma ORM.

deployment.title: Deployment Example
deployment.content: Step-by-step guide to deploying your application.

items.description: Fill out a simple form to express your interest and let us know you

items.description: Receive your exclusive invite code immediately after approval

process.title: Application Process
process.subtitle: Four simple steps to join the community community

steps.title: Submit Application
steps.description: Register an account and fill out the pre-application form

steps.title: Admin Review
steps.description: We carefully review each and every application

steps.title: Get Invite Code
steps.description: System automatically issues invite code upon approval

steps.title: Join Community
steps.description: Use invite code to register your community account

items.question: How long does the approval process take?
items.answer: Typically 1-3 business days depending on application volume. You can check your application status anytime using your query code.

items.question: What if my application is rejected?
items.answer: If rejected, you can revise and resubmit based on admin feedback, up to 3 times maximum.

items.question: Does the invite code expire?
items.answer: Invite codes are valid for 12 hours after issuance. Please use your code promptly or reapply if expired.

items.question: Can I submit multiple applications?
items.answer: Each account can only submit one pre-application. If you need changes, please update your existing application.

items.question: How do I check my application status?
items.answer: After submission, you'll receive a query code. Use it on the query page to view status, admin feedback, and invite code.

cta.title: Ready to Join community?
cta.subtitle: Submit your pre-application now and start your open-source journey
